highlights: DevOps - Helping developers with deployments, administering CI/CD tools like Jenkins, TeamCity, BitBucket, GitLab, Nexus and alike.
Development Services - Supporting other development tooling,  such as Jira, Confluence etc.
Tech Support - Supporting Fortigate products at an advanced level
Troubleshooting - Figuring out solutions to customers' network problems that require advanced investigation. Proposing solutions and improvement
Server Admin - Installation and configuration of live & test Linux servers according to best practices
CI/CD - Configuring and Administering DevOps pipelines
Security - Auditing and configuring various systems
Docker Environments & Containers - Configuration and administration
Network architecture - set-up and administering of Switches, Routers, Firewalls and Load Balancing Systems, with strong experience using Cisco products
Firewall Admin - Configuring and administering Sophos, Fortigate etc. firewall products
Server Admin - Windows + Linux, configuring server roles including auth, email etc.
Software Development - Worked on security oriented software using C++ and C# w/ .NET
CI/CD: Integrated CI/CD capabilities using GitHub Pipelines

projects.name: Ray Tracer
projects.description: A ray tracer implemented fully in Rust, based on Peter Shirley's "Ray Tracing in One Weekend" C++ series. It features depth of field, a basic material system and multi-threaded rendering.

projects.name: Machine Learning Classification Application
projects.description: As a University project, built an application that is able to learn from existing data and classify new data points. Used C, C++ and .NET

projects.name: Realtime Videochat application
projects.description: Using C++ and .NET, created a realtime Video calling application that had UDP Hole Punching capability, and could do both Client-to-Client and Client-Server-Client modes of enabling a video call. Gained experience on optimization of realtime applicaitons, network stack, compression of realtime data etc.
